items.text: Burgers are supposed to be a simple affair. However, the db original burger served at db Bistro Moderne at Marina Bay Sands takes burgers to an artisanal level.
Good food however the environment or design in restaurant tad casual. Mostly Filipino service crew with bad accent. Somehow uncoordinated with their instructions

Make sure you have a reservation. If you don't have a reservation and you wait in line, make sure the maître d knows the order.  Bad experience with the maître d Stacy. This is my first bad tip on 4SQ
Made reservations and still had to wait 15 mins.When asked if my food was medium rare,waiter spoke to another in Tagalog unhappily.Meat had a slight smell.Bill was high.Overall mediocre.
Heard the burgers are good!
At $42 for the original db, it's one of the most expensive burgers I've had, but also one of the most delicious burgers I've had.
Атмосфера хорошая,но бургеры не очень понравились. Может быть нам не повезло. Цены достаточно высокие.
Dessert to order for a chocolate lover: Profiterole. Delicious!
За фирменными бургерами стоит очередь. Помимо них в меню — петух, маринованный в вине, бифштекс с жареным картофелем и тарелка морепродуктов, с которой одному справиться не по силам. (c) GQ
Had their burger twice and wasn't anything to rave about. Should try the other items in the menu to have a more compete opinion.
Ordered the DB burger, slow cooked salmon & pork schnitzel. DISAPPOINTING! The pork schnitzel was dry and tasteless. The burger? I've had better burgers that cost much less. 1 star out of 5.
Yankee Burger must try
Horrible service. Clueless service staff who upon questioning on menu item, only read out what's written on the menu. I've tried Boulud's 3 Michelin-star Daniel in New York, so this is disappointing
The coq au vin is so flavourful. Love the oysters and souffle.
db burger, an anticlimactic disappointment.  Couldn't taste the foie, short rib overpowered, so couldn't taste the actual hamburger part of the pattie. Luke's still has the best burger in town.
Try the piggie burger!
Try their trademark burger: The Original db Burger. At S$42, it is the most expensive and reads very decadent on the menu: sirloin burger filled with braised short ribs foie gras and black truffle.
Nice French cuisines
For the price, the food is not that great...
Nice foods and great services!
Burgers are amazing
Onion soup is yum! Duck confit was a little disappointment as they served with chick peas and beans and looks like a ration. Service is fantastic and I would love to come back again.
If they still have the strawberry Tarte, order it. It's divine.
Get the Fine de Claire oysters ($4 each). One of the tastiest oysters from Brittany!
The original db burger is indeed delish!
Best snack of the year.. ❤️
The souffle is simply wondrous!
They serve Champagne when we were made to wait for 30 min even with reservations
Charcuterie board, DB Burger, Desserts
Absolutely horrible service... Two for entree is ridiculous especially after they say they are coming in 5, but 30 min we are still waiting. The worst Boulud service ever, I expected a lot better.
The awesomest John Dory I've ever eaten!
Very good burgers and excellent service.
Pretty good burger
Nice foods and great service!
The Madeleines are awesome! Must try. Better than Delifrance [: Super yum! ^^
Burgers are awesome... But piggy burger steal the show every time..
db burger is fantastic. C'est bon !!!
Nice food and great service!
I've been here 5 times & have tried 24 dishes. LOVED: 1) Second Marriage Cocktail 2) Fine de Claire Oysters. FAILED: Dark & Stormy. See Top 10 dishes on Foodmento:
The Seafood Platter is probably one of the best starters! It consists of oysters, lobster, crab, mussels, shrimps, and snails. You gonna enjoy it while dining in with your friends.
Wagyu striploin is yummy
a M-U-S-T!!!
Мы отведади тут original burger с фуагра.Очень сытно, в бургер напихали все что можно! Бургер "перегружен".. Цены выше московских.
The oysters are from France. Rich n tasty!!
Nice place. Great menu.
Fries better than burgers.
Выбор вин на уровне ресторанов Гинзы, а называется бистро;)))
Try the French onion soup and "Frenchie" burger
Looking forward to the Mussels and Salad and dark chocolate brownie I ordered. So far the salmon pate is awesome. This place looks uber French but it's actually from Miami!
The best dry Manhattan I have had in SG!
SGD64 for a full course meal is a great deal for a Daniel Boulud recipe. Throw in an extra SGD10 for that foigrass burger.
The duck confit is great! Tender meat, crispy skin and sinful layer of fat!
Great food! The burger is fantastic!
Попробуйте original burger с  Foie gras. Это очень вкусно.
Great steak frites, medium rare. Delicious fries.
Good service
Got the db burger (medium rare) but it's a tad too cooked and hence wasn't juicy. The lean but thick foie gras saved it
The food was good but would say the original db burger wasn't quite as good as I expected especially for the price. The staff was also a little to pushy while trying to pay the bill.
Steak, starters are awesome
Service is great. Glad to find a few pinoys at the bar and at the floor. Tuna Tartare, tartare flambé, tuna salad nicoise, DB burger, duck confit --- all good!!!
Wagyu Striploin is yummy!
The Yankee Burger is very tasty and come with amazing fries😋
Another things.. Earl grey martini with the egg white is refreshing..
Looking for a burger experience? Try the original DB burger ($38) stuffed with Foie Gras & brisket. (Juicy at medium rare but could use a pickle or 2)
Nice food and Super yum!
Service = brilliant ; food = spectacular ; wine list = magnificent. Highly, highly recommended.
Tart Flambee is delicious
Come on Monday nights for the Plateau de Charcuterie and other Lyonnaise specialties off the Mondays in Lyon menu.
Steak frittes were awesome
Soufflé -durian with mangosteen   Sorbet , -😍😍😍😍
Try their Oyster!!!
db burger... ingenious combi, theoretically-speaking, but I must say I was tad underwhelmed by its taste.
New Orleans Casserole is good for sharing. Lots of mussels and clams in a light, wine-infused broth. The profiteroles are also good.
Good to share if you are a small eater .. Very Filing .. Overall just kinda average for that raved about burger .. Hmm
Original dB Burguer estava espectacular e a sobremesa com gelado,cerejas e madalenas, deliciosa. Gostei.
One of the best burgers I've tried. 👌🏼
Decent food in this celebrity restaurant.However,at the end of the day,I was dissatisfied with their poor service.Not the best experience.
I tried the Duck Confit and The Red Wine-Braised Beef. Superb delicious.
EVERYTHING IS AMAZING HERE. Especially the dessert. I just wish they'd bring back the profiteroles...
The seafood platter, Boston lobster and the rib eye steak are to-die-for! Awesome customer service and highly recommended for a smart casual dining experience!
If you're vegan or vegetarian, they have a good veggie burger. Otherwise, go for the seafood
The coq au vin is perfectly cooked chicken served alongside Spätzle that soaks up the red wine jus, while the flourless chocolate torte with chocolate and vanilla sorbet oozes perfectly.
Tres pisos de camarones, almejas, ostiones, callo de hacha... lo más rico!
Duck confit decent; salmon is meh. I liked the kale salad. They also gave us a really tasty gruyere pastry
A must-try !! Spicy tuna is fantastic!!
Типа французская кухня, завтраки слабые, нет ничего кроме различных видов яиц, цены высокие!
The World famous Db Burger is a must try for first timers, and they serve the best Profiteroles and Madeline's
Gets crowded on theatre nights so make a reservation. Go for the coq au vin & madeleines.
The veggie burger had a falafel patty. It was good but really hard to eat because the patty kept breaking apart. The pink floyd drink was really good and refreshing.
Horrible service... Two hour wait for entree is ridiculous, especially after they tell us twice food is coming in 5 min. NOT a Boulud quality restaurant.  Standard Singapore service which is shit!
The DB Burger is like a slice of heaven on earth. Transcendental. Get it medium rare. Excellent service as well.
Nothing to good here. The worst steak ever...
